title: What is something most people don’t know exists, but should? - Quora

response.answer_text: The purpose of the universe. They should know that the universe exists for life and not only for life on earth. Also how many inhabited planets. Read the following for an update: There are two main categories of aliens (extraterrestrials) a) Humanoids born on planet like us, For your information there are more than 5.4 trillions planets that are or have been inhabited in the 7 super universes including the Milky Way now circling around paradise and this is only the beginning. b) Entities created either by God or our Christ Michael like your guardian angel or the life carriers that prepare the DNA appropriate for each planet where they want to implant life. Category a) cannot come here, whereas category b) like your guardian angel are all around us, but most of the time invisible.

Fire escapes at restaurants, clubs and other public venues. Yeah, they know that there are fire escapes in those places, but not many bother or care to see where these fire escapes are located. It takes less than a minute to find out where the fire escape is located. And if you hear the fire alarm, leave immediately. 60 seconds later it can be too late.
